| History                 = After passage of the [[United States of America|United States]] [[Superhuman Registration Act|Superhuman Registration Act (SHRA)]] and the ensuing superhuman [[Civil War (Event)|Civil War]] in America, [[T'Challa (Earth-616)|King T'Challa]] of the technologically-advanced [[Africa|African]] nation of [[Wakanda]] convened the '''Pan-African Congress on the Treatment of Superhumans''', where many of Africa's political leaders attempted to reach a consensus on how to react to the Unites States' implementation of the SHRA.  Attendees included [[Ororo Munroe (Earth-616)|Queen Ororo]] (of Wakanda, and daughter of the late [[N'Daré (Earth-616)|Princess N'Daré]] of [[Kenya]]), [[Khairi Ngala (Earth-616)|Afrikaa]] (of [[Mohannda]]), [[Zanda (Earth-616)|Zanda]] (the exiled Princess of [[Narobia]]), [[M'Baku (Earth-616)|Man-Ape]] (representing Wakanda's [[Jabari-Lands|Jabari Tribe]]), [[Moses Magnum (Earth-616)|Moses Magnum]] (of [[Canaan]]), and [[Joshua N'Dingi (Earth-616)|President N'Dingi]] (of [[Mbangawi]]).{{r|Civil War: Battle Damage Report Vol 1 1}}

Although the representatives failed to reach an agreement before the Congress disbanded, King T'Challa thereafter embarked on a diplomatic tour, visiting many nations deemed hostile to United States interests, such as [[Latveria]], [[Attilan]], and [[Atlantis]].  The [[United States Department of State (Earth-616)|U.S. State Department]] feared that those rogue nations, who believed that the U.S. now planned to use the international organization known as [[Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division (Earth-616)|S.H.I.E.L.D.]] to export the SHRA abroad, were forming an international coalition to oppose the spread of superhuman registration legislation to other countries.{{r|Civil War: Battle Damage Report Vol 1 1}}
